thread.title: Good Location and a nice place to stay.

author: sjm0323
title: Good Location and a nice place to stay.
text:
Stayed one night to see Aladdin. The lobby was busy when we arrived. When it was my turn to check in I was greeted by Merrick with a smile and a welcome to Marriott. He explained breakfast location and time. Internet password. Just a great experience. The room was clean, comfortable and quiet. Breakfast was typical, eggs, sausage, fruit, waffles. The coffee was good and worth a second cup. I booked direct on line and the price was $17.00 better than I found on travel sites. I will stay there again
Room Tip: Our room faced 39th. not much of a view but quiet little traffic compared to facing 6th Ave See more room tips
